alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 09 at 3:01PM CDT until May 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning Today, Fire Weather Watch Tuesday and Wednesday... A Red Flag Warning for critical fire weather conditions remains in effect today south of a line from Kit Carson county Colorado to Gove county Kansas. Counties not in the warning. Fire Weather Watches are in effect for the far southwestern and western portions of the forecast area on Tuesday and Wednesday. Outdoor burning is highly discouraged across the highlighted counties across Colorado and Kansas over the next few days. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT /10 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 013...014...027...028...029 AND 042... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman... Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas...Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace... Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan...Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Winds...Southeast 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Gove; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
